Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class BaseMeController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.ControllerGuiInterface
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.BaseController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.BaseMeController
public class BaseMeController
extends BaseController
Controller of the client player base scene, show a the Player Board, LeaderCards with all the info updates about the player clietn Entry point for the begin of the turn
